document.masterDocTitle: Illustrated key to genera and catalogue of Mymaridae (Hymenoptera) in America north of Mexico

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Gonatocerus dolichocerus
Ashmead, 1887: 192
. Holotype ♀ (USNM). TL: USA , Florida , Jacksonville.

(distribution);
Triapitsyn, 2013b: 213
(key), 214 (distribution).

Cosmocomoidea marilandica : Huber, 2015a: 20
(incorrectly listed as valid species instead of synonym of
C . dolichocerus
).
